thread.title: BRIEF-Wynn Resorts Special Committee Retains Gibson, Dunn & Crutcher Llp, Expands Review

title: BRIEF-Wynn Resorts Special Committee Retains Gibson, Dunn & Crutcher Llp, Expands Review

organizations.name: brief-wynn resorts special committee retains gibson, dunn & crutcher llp

text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Wynn Resorts Ltd:
* SPECIAL COMMITTEE OF WYNN RESORTS BOARD OF DIRECTORS RETAINS GIBSON, DUNN & CRUTCHER LLP, EXPANDS REVIEW
* WYNN RESORTS - ‍SPECIAL COMMITTEE OF BOARD WILL CONDUCT EXPANDED AND COMPREHENSIVE REVIEW OF WYNN RESORTS’ INTERNAL POLICIES AND PROCEDURES
* WYNN RESORTS LTD - ‍BOARD ALSO SAID THAT NOMINATING AND CORPORATE GOVERNANCE COMMITTEE WILL COMMENCE PROCESS TO ADD ADDITIONAL DIRECTORS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
